title: White Fang and the Gold Diggers

sources.title: White Fang and the Gold Diggers (1975) Spaghetti Western | Subtitled
sources.description:
Sandy Shaw inherits the "Eagle's Nest", a gold mine in Canada's far north. He moves there with his young son, Rick and faithful dog Whiskey but soon finds a deadly enemy in Taft, who wants the mine for himself. When things are complicated by the arrival of Sandy's proxy bride, revenge and greed collide and violence is the inevitable result.

Original title: La spacconata (1975)

Director: Alfonso Brescia
Writers: Giuseppe Maggi, Edgar B. Cooper, Piero Regnoli
Stars: Robert Woods, Ignazio Spalla, Franco Lantieri
Genres: Italian Cinema, Adventure, Comedy, Western


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
04:43 A man and his son journey to Nid d'Aigle, facing unexpected challenges.
09:42 A man and his parrot share witty banter while dreaming of wealth.
18:04 Father and son receive a warning about the dangers awaiting them at their new home.
30:54 A poker game is interrupted by the arrival of Donovan’s men, stirring trouble.
39:08 At a wedding, a woman is accused of cheating on her husband.
48:04 The group plans to exploit a massive gold deposit in Nid d'Aigle mountain.
58:34 Plans unfold for the night, and Sandy asks Connie to be his mother.
1:09:38 The group faces challenges and mysteries while trying to help Connie.
1:26:42 A tense showdown with Donovan leads to the discovery of gold.

metadata.Plot: A father, son, and their faithful dog White Fang go on a dangerous journey in search of a gold mine.
metadata.Writer: Giuseppe Maggi, Edgar B. Cooper, Piero Regnoli
